name: Black Knight Commander
description: The Black Knight Commander is a Medium humanoid clad in plate armor, wielding a lance and mace, exuding an aura of authority and menace.
memorable: It combines martial prowess with the ability to instill fear, utilizing terrifying charges while mounted.
goals: To lead and command allies on the battlefield, exerting control over the fight through fear and tactical advantage.
relations: Often accompanied by a warhorse, commanding other creatures in a military context.
environment: Typically found in battlefields or in the service of dark lords, leading troops.
strengths: Possesses high damage output through melee attacks and a unique ability to enhance allies' damage while mounted.
weaknesses: Reliance on its warhorse can be a vulnerability if separated from it.
attacks: Employs a multiattack strategy with a lance and mace, capable of dealing significant damage.
most_powerful_ability: Frightful Charge, allowing it to move through enemies and deal heavy damage while instilling fear.
equipment: Wields a lance and mace, and is equipped with plate armor.
skills: Proficient in Animal Handling, Athletics, and Intimidation, making it effective in controlling mounts and influencing others.
additional_information: Has a custom-barded warhorse that enhances its combat capabilities.
Can remain secure on its mount, immune to forced dismounts.
Frightful Charge ability recharges quickly, enabling frequent use.
Enhances allies within 10 feet with a damage bonus.
Noted for its strategic mobility and martial discipline.
